column4: any fail2ban users out there? I am looking for nice fail2ban jail.configuration
cant say i ever used that feature of fail2ban
you can enable new rules. such as rules for w00t w00t maniac
not sure why i would need to. :) i just ban based on how many ssh attempts.
so your fail2ban is not monitoring anything else than sshd
ssh is basically the only public service i got going on my server. so yes.
ssh and znc is all  have  going.
you can monitor any log with fail2ban, including znv, or vnc?
never really needed to.  I have  only the 2 exposed services forwarded through my router.  I cant say i ever noticed many znc attempts. Just ssh.
not even running those at this time.
i have changed my port. i still get ssh break in attempts.
I recenlt enabled a jail configuration for fail2ban.log itself

just random scans. - I also have ssh set up where it onlyu works with key based auth. so no password attempts will work.   and the fail2ban (i think) is set where they get like 3 tries and they are banned.
if they get banned here.. they are banned. :)
i could write jail configuration for any log file, If I had understood regexp
actually i think its people on irc that see me and my ip. ;)
